abstract: In a video address on Saturday, President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine pledged that the perpetrators of an attack on an airliner would be punished and that the bodies of the Ukrainians killed in the crash would be promptly returned.
lead_paragraph: In a video address on Saturday, President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine pledged that the perpetrators of an attack on an airliner would be punished and that the bodies of the Ukrainians killed in the crash would be promptly returned.
